p.d: Edmour is making an effort to understand Yolande, who's being even more capricious and unpredictable than usual. Rita meets a biker with a dubious past and an escapade in his company proves very revealing. Gilberte tries to persuade Ferraille to reinstate the flea market for Heritage Day. Directed by: Jean-Marc Piché (season 2, Canada, 2019) Screenplay: Patricia Léger Cast: Patricia Léger (Rita Melanson), Marie-Jo Thério (Yolande LeBlanc), Marcel-Romain Thériault (Lomer Dupuis), Marc Lamontagne (Edmour LeBlanc), Raphaël Butler (Ferraille Gaudet), Claire Normand (Gilberte Cormier), Gabriel Robichaud (Zoël Bourgeois), Bianca Richard (Terri Cormier) Genre: comedy
